data.caption: Clarification On Price Movement
data.news_body: K M Sugar Mills Ltd is submitting clarification on price movement of the company.

data.caption: Clarification sought from K M Sugar Mills Ltd
data.news_body:
The Exchange has sought clarification from K M Sugar Mills Ltd on April 22, 2024 with reference to significant movement in price, in order to ensure that investors have latest relevant information about the company and to inform the market so that the interest of the investors is safeguarded.

The reply is awaited.
